attributes.action: Mae it easier for those UK residents who marry overseas persons to bring their partners to UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current immigration rules cause married couples to be forced to live apart for considerable periods of time, sometimes years,  due to unnecessarily stringent conditions.  Visa fees could be reduced and provided the UK partner can show adequate funds going through the bank account no notice needs to be taken of the balance.  UK authorities should take notice of articles 8 and 12 of the European Convention on Human Rights and fundamental Freedoms.
